issue.title: www.pinterest.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.pinterest.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pinterest.com%2F) ### Comment > i paid $80 for this shit. why is there still ads? ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/j6brua7dk34sc8c000ccsss0w4sgscserwspbc3etk.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.22.0 (5225) System version: | `Microsoft Windows NT 10.0.26100.0` Browser: | Chrome License type: | paid AdGuard driver: | WFP Tracking protection: | **General settings**:
Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180),
Disable cache for third-party requests

**Browser API**:
Block Push API,
Block Location API

**Windows tracking**:
Disable Windows Telemetry,
Turn off Advertising ID,
Disable Windows Defender automatic samples submission,
Disable WAP Push Message Routing Service

**Miscellaneous**:
Hide your IP address (208.54.104.184),
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Protect against DPI DNS filtering: | server: `System`

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.pinterest.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pinterest.com%2F) ### Comment > IS THIS WHAT I PAID AN $80 LIFE SUBSCRIPTION TO ADGUARD FOR?!?!??! WHAT A RIPOFF! YOUR SERVICE IS A SCAM!!!!!!!!!!! this is a scam!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! i paid you crooks EIGHTY DOLLARS!!!!!!!!!!!! back when i had the free version of the chrome adguard extension, i didnt have this problem. and i drop $80 on this sh*t and NOW THIS IS WHAT HAPPENS?????????? YOU ARE ALL CROOKS!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! >:( ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/gyk3lysfotw8g4o0c4gsg4coo80gog03bn6y26itew.png?nc=1)

Screenshot 4 ![Screenshot 4](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/6khebq22s1kwksggk8cc04wcso4cw0ce4ule2jh9c8.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 5 ![Screenshot 5](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/hqtmk466c6goowksg4scw8wwgo0kw8wdd7viqfz2qo.png?nc=1)
